overview: Canniheals is a comprehensive look into the anti-inflammatory, health benefits of medical marijuana, (cannabis). Cannabis has been scientifically proven to benefit diseases without harmful, life threatening side effects as with prescription opiates and pharmaceutical drugs. A few examples of illnesses benefitted by Cannabis: Cancer, IBS, Diabetes, Chronic pain, MS, Epilepsy and many more are discussed in this film. DVD Topics include: *Anti-Inflammatory healing *Human Cannibinoid System & Cannibinoid Receptors *Edibles *THC vs CBD *Sativa vs Indica vs Hybrid *Lab Testing *Cannabis do's & don'ts *Dispensary tips And so much more!!
title: Canniheals
